textfields.tf: The parameterization of the sensor has to be changed.
The lines of the sensor cable are wrongly connected and have to be swapped.
The height sensor lever has to be installed rotated by 180 degrees to revers the armature movement.
The sensor is defect and has to be substituted.
Please mark the right statement. After that click on
What has to be done, when during raising the superstructure the count values of a height sensor are decreasing?
No, this way the problem is not solvable.
During raising the superstructure the count values must increase. Thereto the lever of the height sensor has to be mounted the other way around.
No, this cannot be the reason.
No, during raising the superstructure the count values must increase. Otherwise the ECU detects a so called "plausibility error".
Exactly. During raising the superstructure also the count values must increase. Thereto the lever of the height sensor has to be mounted the other way around.
